title: OpenAI's image model gets built-in style feature on ChatGPT
summary: OpenAI's image gen model, which is available via ChatGPT for free, now lets you easily create AI images even if you're not familiar with trends or prompt engineering. [...]

title: Abacus dark web drug market goes offline in suspected exit scam
summary: Abacus Market, the largest Western darknet marketplace supporting Bitcoin payments, has shut down its public infrastructure in a move suspected to be an exit scam. [...]

title: Windows KB5064489 emergency update fixes Azure VM launch issues
summary: Microsoft has released an emergency update to fix a bug that prevents Azure virtual machines from launching when the Trusted Launch setting is disabled and Virtualization-Based Security (VBS) is enabled. [...]

title: North Korean XORIndex malware hidden in 67 malicious npm packages
summary: North Korean threat actors planted 67 malicious packages in the Node Package Manager (npm) online repository to deliver a new malware loader called XORIndex to developer systems. [...]
